preference.name: SUBSCMPL_LRD_TARGET_MAT_LAB_REPORT
preference.preference_description: Specifies the name and input attribute count (delimited by a colon (:)) of the query that Teamcenter uses to search for an existing material laboratory object in Teamcenter. A material laboratory object is used as an anchor object for lab report declarations (LRDs). If no material laboratory object is found, a new object is created; else, the existing one is used. Default value: Substance Compliance LRD - Get Material Lab Report: 2 Parameters: Laboratory Report ID and Laboratory Report Type

context.name: Teamcenter
context.value: Substance Compliance LRD - Get Material Lab Report:2
